description:
*** Redesigned with many new features (see below).
KalemSoft Media Player is a full-featured media player that can play music, videos and pictures. It can play media locally from the device, a remote PC or a UPnP/DLNA server. It can also stream live content from devices on a Windows PC such as a webcam or a TV card (only analog TV cards are supported currently).  
KalemSoft Media Player can now directly stream from a UPnP/DLNA enabled device such as a NAS drive without requiring any other application or server. A list of tested servers is available at http://www.kalemsoft.com/site/dlna.html 
It also works as an external player with BHome v1.3.0 or above.
If you do not have a UPNP/DLNA capable device, you can download a free application KalemSoft Media Streamer from www.kalemsoft.com/site/downloads2.html and install it on a remote PC. This enables streaming outside a LAN so that you can enjoy your home content from anywhere in the world with internet access.  
KalemSoft Media Player has the following features:   
* Support for mkv, flv, divx, xvid, avi, wmv, wma, mp4, mp3, ac3, aac, flac, ogg, mov, rm, rmvb, ts, mts, m2ts, asf, vob, jpg, gif, png and many other codecs and formats (see below for limitations).   
* Integrated UPNP/DLNA browser
* Audio visualizations extensible with milkdrop presets
* External SRT or embedded SSA/DVB subtitles
* Hardware accelerated playback
* Ability to switch audio and subtitle tracks
* Custom playlists and a favorites list  
* Various aspect ratios
* Back to back playback with shuffle, ordered play or loop options
* Resume feature
* Slide show support
* Album art for files with id3 tags
* Thumbnail view 
* Skip forward/backward with programmable skip duration
* Button lock
* Customizable streaming bitrate
* Record streams from KalemSoft Media Streamer on the device
This application will NOT play DRM copy-protected content (e.g., Digital Copy, copy protected iTunes, copy protected DVDs).
versionNote:
- Integrated DLNA/UPNP player
- Integrated photo viewer
- Album art support
- New redesigned UI
- Thumbnail browsing support
- Custom playlist support
- Audio visualizations with support for external milkdrop presets
- Optional software decoding support to improve compatibility with some media files
- Fix for "could not communicate with the directory service" error
